casebody.data:
Charles McPHERSON, Appellant, v. SAWYER GRANT LAND COMPANY, a Wisconsin Corporation, Appellee. No. 7222. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. May 6, 1937. Norris, McPherson, Harrington & Waer, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellant. Knappen, Uhl, Bryant & Snow, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellee.

Before HICKS and ALLEN, Circuit Judges, and MARTIN, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered and adjudged that this case be and is affirmed upon the grounds and for the reasons set forth in the opinion of the District Judge filed July 16, 1935.
